title: Synchronisation failed, dropping peer, ROPSTEN network stop syncing on block 4169999
body:
Hi there,

please note that this is an issue tracker reserved for bug reports and feature requests.

#### System information

Geth version: Geth/v1.8.16-stable-477eb093/darwin-amd64/go1.11
OS & Version: Mac OS Mojave
Commit hash : ROPSTEN network stop syncing!

#### Expected behaviour


#### Actual behaviour
Welcome to the Geth JavaScript console!

instance: Geth/v1.8.16-stable-477eb093/darwin-amd64/go1.11
 modules: admin:1.0 debug:1.0 eth:1.0 miner:1.0 net:1.0 personal:1.0 rpc:1.0 txpool:1.0 web3:1.0

> web3.eth.syncing
{
  currentBlock: 4169999,
  highestBlock: 4174845,
  knownStates: 0,
  pulledStates: 0,
  startingBlock: 4169999
}

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

geth --datadir /mydatadir --testnet --rpc --syncmode "full" --rpcapi "web3,personal,admin,debug,db,net,eth,miner,rpc,txpool" --rpccorsdomain "*" --rpcaddr 127.0.0.1 --rpcport 8545 console

#### Backtrace

ERROR[10-05|11:11:31.773] 
########## BAD BLOCK #########
Chain config: {ChainID: 3 Homestead: 0 DAO: <nil> DAOSupport: true EIP150: 0 EIP155: 10 EIP158: 10 Byzantium: 1700000 Constantinople: <nil> Engine: ethash}

Number: 4170000
Hash: 0x82668407fd4e81d7a42627150d2c94e1cdd3fcaa887c2b3783db8c3a6e81947d


Error: invalid mix digest
##############################
 
WARN [10-05|11:11:31.773] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=9c854be9dc0b2e79 err="retrieved hash
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
